description: Detects BITS transfer job downloading files from a file sharing domain.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: BITS Transfer Job Download From File Sharing Domains
query: (winlog.event_id:"16403" AND RemoteName:(*.ghostbin.co\/* OR *.hastebin.com* OR *.paste.ee* OR *anonfiles.com* OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/* OR *ddns.net* OR *gist.githubusercontent.com* OR *mediafire.com* OR *mega.nz* OR *paste.ee* OR *pastebin.com* OR *pastebin.pl* OR *pastetext.net* OR *privatlab.com* OR *privatlab.net* OR *raw.githubusercontent.com* OR *send.exploit.in* OR *sendspace.com* OR *storage.googleapis.com* OR *transfer.sh* OR *ufile.io*))
